venue.name: University of Connecticut Greater Hartford Campus

item.description:
SAT March 27 -Guitarist Jorge Caballero with CT Guitar Society & The CT Theatre Group

In its 70-year history, the Walter M. Naumburg Foundation has sponsored competitions for piano, voice and most of the orchestral instruments, but it was only last year that the foundation turned its attention to the guitar. Jorge Caballero, a 19-year-old guitarist from Peru, won the foundation's first guitar competition, and as part of his prize he was presented in his New York debut recital at Merkin Concert Hall. - New York Times, March 1, 1997

At:

University of Connecticut
Greater Hartford Campus
1800 Asylum Ave
West Hartford, CT 06117

Pick up your tickets at the will call window, or come out and party with us!

The CT Theatre Group will meet before and after the show, info will be emailed to all CT Theatre Group Ticket Holders

Visit http://www.jcaballero...

We have only 25 tickets available in the CT Theatre Group section

Advance Tickets are $25 * Tickets are $30 at the events if any remain

Visit http://CTTheatreGroup... or call (860) 987-7888

Get Your ticket today before we sell out!

=======================================================================

Take Exit 43 off of i-84 West or i-84 East, for Park Road (0.5 mi)

Turn right onto Park Road **Stay in the Middle lane (Trout Brook Dr North ONLY). (75ft)

Take immediate Left onto Trout Brook Drive (1.7 mi)

Beyond the intersection of Trout Brook Drive and Asylum Ave

Take a right into Students' and Visitor's Parking lot.

Campus is located across the street from Parking lot
item.how_to_find_us: Pick up your tickets at the Will Call window, the CT Theatre Group will meet before and after the show * Meeting Location and times will be emailed to CT Theatre Group ticket holders

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount
